Made to Measure Waste Services

Anenta offer a range of services to help your organisation manage its waste. We optimise to achieve financial savings and operational efficiency, and provide you with a fully integrated solution within our advanced online management platform.

Our made to measure services are particularly suited to organisations with multiple locations. Our service takes you through a number of simple steps to get you the service you need.

Taking on Existing Contracts

Regardless of the number of contracts or locations you have under your control we can quickly bring your existing waste contracts on to our platform. We will then be able to give you control over the day to day operations of your waste services. When these contracts come up for renewal we will be able to simply specify and procure you new contracts based on the solid information held within our systems.

Specification and Procurement of New Contracts

To deliver you the perfect waste contract we need to understand how your current contracts operate, both the good and the bad. If we already have your existing contract on our platform we can use that data to provide this information. If not we have substantial experience in assessing issues based on your existing invoices or bill backing data.

Based on a solid understanding of your requirements and using our network of waste providers or by accessing Public Sector Frameworks, we will procure you a service that will save you money. All procurement is conducted under the strict guidance of your corporate financial instructions and budgetary limitations.

Operational Management

Consistent operational management is key to the success of delivering and implementing your waste contract. Our experience has shown that unless you have robust systems in place to understand all the variables in delivering waste management services, it can quickly get out of hand.

We have developed our online management platform to bring our clients, suppliers and other stakeholders to a single point of unified management. The platform ensures the delivery of the highest quality service from the chosen disposal provider, it tracks and resolves service level failures ensuring accountability at every level.

Take a look and see some of what our ​*online management system*​ can do.

Financial Control

For each of your locations the platform knows exactly what has been specified to happen and when. Using this information we can validate the disposal providers invoices, making sure that you are only paying for the services they delivered.

We track a range of KPIs that let us and you know when they are succeeding and failing to deliver to the correct standard.

From a detailed specification and the actual usage data for each and every location we are able to create detailed budgets, and what-if analysis helping you to manage risk, preparing for legislative change and future tendering and procurement.

Online Waste Management Platform

Control your organisation's waste from a single centralised platform, giving you flexibility and control.

Service Management

At the core of all Anenta services is our simple to use online waste management platform. This platform allows you to view and manage your site’s services. You can view your specifications, including the number and types of bins, frequency of collections and a calendar showing deliveries and collections. You can view and report service issues, including missed collections, rescheduling and ad-hoc collections request or the delivery of consumables.

Service Notifications

We will proactively send notifications of any changes which may impact service delivery. For example, if a collection will be missed we will notify anyone affected giving the reason it was missed and when it will be completed performed.

User Management

You can add multiple users to our online platform. All users can view a sites specification, open support tickets and report issues. Admin users also have the ability to manage specifications and view billing information etc. This gives you the power to be in full control and also save your organisation time in managing your waste collections.

Service Validation

Anenta’s waste platform knows when and what you should have collected as well as any service failures that may occur. We use this information to validate the accuracy of any invoice issued to you, ensuring you are only paying for the service that you requested. We spot and validate where additional collections are made or where more waste was collected than was requested.

Analysis

The first step to specify and procure the correct waste service for your organisation is to understand what you currently have. Our analysis identifies your current waste streams, their associated quantities and costs, and any recurring services issues. We are then in a position to be able to tailor a solution to fit your requirements.

Service Billing and Compliance

You have access to all billing information online, including invoices and service credits. We give you easy access to any required compliance documents including Waste Transfer Notes, Hazardous Waste Consignment Notes.
